net.semanticmetadata.lire.imageanalysis.features.global.mpeg7

Class ColorLayoutImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.semanticmetadata.lire.imageanalysis.features.global.mpeg7.ColorLayoutImpl
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ColorLayout

    public class ColorLayoutImpl
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for extrcating & comparing MPEG-7 based CBIR descriptor ColorLayout
    Author:
    Mathias Lux, mathias@juggle.at

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ColorLayoutImpl() 
      ColorLayoutImpl(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
      Create a ColorLayout Object from the given BufferedImage. 6 Y and 3 C Coefficients are used, if you want to use another number you have to set it with the Setters.
      ColorLayoutImpl(int numberOfYCoeff, int numberOfCCoeff, java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
      Create a ColorLayout Object from the given BufferedImage with the desired number of Coefficients

      • ColorLayoutImpl

        public ColorLayoutImpl()

      • ColorLayoutImpl

        public ColorLayoutImpl(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
        Create a ColorLayout Object from the given BufferedImage. 6 Y and 3 C Coefficients are used, if you want to use another number you have to set it with the Setters.
        Parameters:
        image - the input image

      • ColorLayoutImpl

        public ColorLayoutImpl(int numberOfYCoeff,
                       int numberOfCCoeff,
                       java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
        Create a ColorLayout Object from the given BufferedImage with the desired number of Coefficients
        Parameters:
        image - the input image
        numberOfYCoeff - desired number of Y Coefficients
        numberOfCCoeff - desired number of Cr and Cb Coefficients

                                   int[] CbCoeff2,

        Takes two ColorLayout Coeff sets and calculates similarity.
        Returns:
        -1.0 if data is not valid.
